content: /tprabhaathatthinte srashdaavum, andhakaaratthe maayichukallanyu srshdikallkku prakaasham nalki santoshippikkunnavanumaaya kartthaave! Nyangallil paripaakathayulllla nadapadikall srshdich, paapaandhakaaratthe nyangallilninnu poornnamaayi neekkikkallayename. Nyangallude kartthaavum nithya daivavume! Ninte krpayude mahaneeyakiranangallaal nyangalle prashobhippichu santoshippikkukayum cheyyaname.
Karunayulllla daivame! Ninte karunayaal nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname.

Shubhachihnam thaan sleebaa
Vijayakkodi thaan sleebaa
Namme rakshicheedum
Sleebaayil pukazhunnu naam.

Yeshumaheshaa! Nin sleebaa
Nin jananee praarththhanayivayaal
Paayikkuka maayikkuka nin
Shikshayumarishatthin dandum.

Aadaamyarkkaayu sleebaaye
Govaniyaakkiyavan dhanyan
Nibishleehanmaar sahadenmaa-
Rathiloodaaroham cheythu.

Sleebaa vaanu svargatthil
Sleebaa vaanu bhoomiyilum
Sleebaa pallllikall dayaraakall-
Kkellaamaakatte kotta.

Naathhan koottaayullllathinaal
Dushdane naam pedikkilla
Than divyaayudhadhaarikallaam
Nammallkkunnathiyundaakum.

Sleebaaye thollil thaangi
Seeyonil ninnum poyon
Mrtharthannasthhikallin meethe
Choriyatte karunappanineer.

Naathhaa! Kurishinmel moshdaa-
Vennonam nin vaagdaanam
Praapikkaname thrithvatthe-
Yettuparanya parethanmaar.

Yerushalem gogultthaayil
Krooshithanaameesho sthothram
Paarapillarnnu thanddhvaniyaal
mrthareri sthothram paadi.

Adhipathiyude thalayakhileshaa!
Sleebaayaal nee chhedichu
Durayerum mrthithan koymaye
/tyuddhatthaal chhinnichathinaal
Sarvveshaa! Nyangall sthuthi nin
Shaashvathashaantikkennaarkkum.

Pethgomo-sthothratthin baliyarppippin
Daivam moshayude-praarththhanayum dhoopavumettaan
Sabhayin koodaaram thannil
Naathhaa! Nin sabhayil-daasaranachoru dhoopamithum
Mumpaharonrethennonam-haaleluyyaa
Bhoosvargapathe! Devapathe! Ninne janamaaraadhippoo.

Krobesraappikalle-kaivittampodu kanyakayil vaa
Nonaam veeran sthuthyan
Udayonavallil pu-kkudayonum manujanumaayon
Nirgathanaayaanavalleennum haale-
Naravargatthin rakshakane-jaathikalle varuvin vaazhtthin.

Aa dhanyayodoppam-edanileykkangeriyoraa
Shushrooshayathum smaranaarham
En kartthaavinte-maathaave! Shubhamodu varike-
Nnaarkkum parishuddhanmaarum-haa......
Lokatthodaliyaanamme! Ekaathmajanodarththhikka.

Paramonnathashakthyaa-rakshakane prasavichollaam
Paavana kanye! Ninnormma
Kondaadum naallil-lokatthodu krpacheythiduvaan
Nin suthanodarththhikkenam-haa....
Nin praarththhanayaal yaachanayaa-lavanalivundaakum noonam.

Sleebaathanmeethe vaazhvin muntiriyinkulaya-
Chakkilamartthi yoodanmaar
Ruchinokkiyathilla-paavanasabhayathine kaikko
Ndanudinavum haa! Nukarunnu-haa......
Sabhayum makkallumennekkum-paanam cheythaanandikkum.

Vishvaasam prakhyaa-pikkaan karshakarennonam
Nirgatharaam shleehanmaare!
Praarththhicheedaname nalvitthukalle nyerukkeedum
Kallakalle nirmmoolam neekkaan-haa.......
Kshithi muzhuvan suvisheshatthin-vitthu vithachon dhanyan thaan.

Kartthaavinu preethi-paaram nalkum surabhilamaam
Dhoopamathaayi sahadenmaar
Kopichon naathhan nyangallodangunirappaayaa
Navarude raktham kandappoll-haa.......
Thiruvishdam niravettiyava-nnishdam niravettum naathhan.

Maartthommaashleehaa! Dhanyapithaave! Ippoll ni-
Nnidavakaye sandarshikka
Jaathikallude maddhya-paalakanattoru koottatthe
Chennaaykkallithaa chitharippoo-haa......
Idayanmaarkkidayan mashihaa!-kidayekkootticherkkename.

Kartthaavinvalamaay-kurishil thoongiyachoranura
Chevam chonnaan nyaan dhanyan
Paapam cheyyukayaal aadamadachoru vaathil thura-
Nnullllilananyen nin vaakkaal-haa......
Kartthaave! Sthuthiyennevam-thellivodu nyaanulghoshikkum.

Daivatthin suthane saakshichoraam neethiparar-
Kkidayillethum lajippaan
Vaagdaanam siddham-en saakshiye nyaan saakshikkum
Pantiyirutthidumennevam-haa.....
Nin saakshikallaam nyangalleyum rakshakane!
Saakshikkename.

Naathhaa! Mrthiheenaa-ninneyettaparethanmaar-
Kkekeedaname nallormma
Mannaaytheernnore-punaruththhaana mahaadivase
Mahimayodezhunnelppikkename-haa.....
Thirurakthatthaal vaangiyoraamrthare jeevippikkaname.

Pethgomo-pulariyilen naadam kellkkaname-haaleluyyaa
Aa vanpulariyil nee-aagathanaakumpoll
Ningalleyarikille-nnarullaruthe naathhaa!
Paapam pokkum nin rakthashareerangall
Achaaramathaayu nee nyangallkkaayu nalki
Haaleluyyaa-jaathikallathumoolam sthuthi paadeedunnu.

Sthuthiyum nathiyum nallaadaravum menmel
Kanyakamariyaamin-nandananennennum
Pettollaam kanni-kunyine mulayootti
Rakshakanaam prathhamaa thmajane prasavichaall
Haa..... Sathyam lokatthin-rakshakanivanallo.

Sarvvaadrshyanaho-jananatthinu vannu
Kanyaamaathaavi-nnettaan naragaathram
Bheekara shakadatthin-perumayupekshichon
Mariyaamin muttil-parilaallithanaayi
Haa........Maanavashaapatthe-maayichon dhanyan.

Mariyaamin smaranam varadaayakamaaka
Thal praarththhana nyangallkkaathmaavinu kotta
Nibishleehaa sahadaa-naathhan mariyaamee-
Nnudayam cheythulakam-rakshippaan vannoo
Haa.......Sathyam lokatthin rakshakanivanallo.

Parishuddhaslleebaa-parishuddhatha nalki
Punyakaram slleebaa-kadamellaam veetti
Slleebaa dushdan thannadhikaaram neekki
Bhaktharkkullavaakki-vijayaahlaadangall
Haa....Nyangalle nin slleebaa-chirakil kaakkenam.

Sabhaye! Nin vaathil-kaavalkkaarennum
Saatthaanil ninnum-kaakkunnu ninne
Sheemonaadhaaram-pauloso shilppi
Yohannaanishdan-shushrooshakkaaran
Haa.....Roohaathan veenaa-naadam daaveedaam.

Daivikadaasanmaar-vidhi nilaye ninnu
Svargatthenokki-chonnevam nyangall
ninne snehichu-lokatthetthalllli
Nyangall jayikkatte-tholkkatte doshi
Haa......Parareedaivatthin-veeryam kaanatte.

Aaraam dinamaakum velllliyil moodhanmaar
Naatti mahonnathanaam kartthaavin skeeppaa
Aa velllliyilavane kuntatthaal kutthi
Jeevanezhum ninavum neerum-pravahichu
Haa-nampiya jaathikall than paapam maayichu.

Punaraagamanadinam-bheekaramaanettam
naathhan garjikkum-lokam virakollllum
Vidhipathichelodiru-nneduthuranneedum
Sarvvarahasyavuma-nneram vellivaakkum
Haa.....Neethiyezhum nyaayaadheeshaa kaniyenam.

Nin vidhiyathighoram-nyangade pizhapaaram
Neethi kayarkkunnu-odaan tharamilla
Vidhiyelkkaan ninne vashamaakkiyoranpaal
Vidhiyathilettaruthe-thettukallorkkalle
Haa......Neethiyezhum nyaayaadheeshaa!Krpa cheyka.

Pharavonisraayel-jaathiye marddichu
Thiramaalakallavane-jalanidhiyil thaazhtthi
Muttum thunayatto-nevam ghoshichu
Daivatthodu poruthum-marthyanu haa! Naasham
Haa.....Naathhan thunayaayon-dharaniyilathi dhanyan.

Punaruththhaanatthe-nokkipaartthidum
Nyangade mrthigathare vediyaruthe naathhaa!
Jeevanavarkkeesho-nalkuka karunaabdhe!
Avaridathadavillaa-thadayanamaashvaasam
Haa....Punaruththhaapakanaam-ninneyavar vaazhtthum.

Vellum shathrukkalle ninnaal nyangall-haa...
Dveshikalle methichidum nin naamatthil
Vairikallil ninnum kaatthengalle nee-haa...
Shathrukkalle lajippichu.

Maanavavargatthepporil
Veezhtthiyoraakalkkarusaaye
Naathhaa! Nee nin sleebaayaal
Paade tholppichodichu.
Thanmoolam kooppunnengall
Jeevadamaam nin sleebaaye

Pethgomo-cherkkuka chirakin keezhil nyangalle naathhaa! Haaleluyyaa.
Udayam cheyyum pulariyathil-jeevasleebaa
Prakadippikkum dharaniyiludaneellam-nijavijayam
Keertthikkum jaathikallathine-ssammathamenye
Dhanyatha nediya sahadenmaar-makudam praapikkum
/tnaathhaa! Nin-mrthiyaal rakshitharaam
/tnyangallu-mangathine vananganame
Dhanyan sleebaakottaye nyangallkkaay-nirtthiyavan.

Raajaavaam kusthanteeno-saakaashatthil
Vismayakaramaayu sleebaayude-roopam darshichu
Kettaanavanarullappaa-dappozhevam
Praanakarasleebaayaal praa-pikkum nee vijayam
/tprathimakalle nirmmoolam neekki
/tsleebaaye-maathram maanichaan
dhanyan sleebaakkottaye nyangallkkaayu nirtthiyavan.

Sleebaayaale than sabhaye veendaanaam puthraa!
Shaino nalkitthan suthare nee rakshichaalum.
Aaghoshatthoderushaleminnoorukall thaandi
Sleebaayum kondaanyapasamgham yaathra thudarnnu
Ee vrtthaantam kettoruneram kusthanteenosu
Sainyasametham varavelppekaan nirgathanaayi.

Bhoopan sleebaa kandoru neram than thalathaazhtthi
Kumpittevam kaikalluyartthi sthothram paadi
Vairiyodelpaan sleebaaye neeyenperkkeki
Daivathanoojaa! Ninneyanisham keertthikkunnen.

Daivathanoojaa! Valabhaagatthe moshdaavinmel
Nee krpa cheythu, nyangade melum krpa cheyyenam.

/Tkartthaave! Ninne sthothram cheyyunnathum / unnathamaaya ninte naamatthinu sthuthipaadunnathum / prabhaatha samayatthu ninte krpayeyum / raathrikaalangallil ninte vishvaasattheyum ariyi kkunnathum ethra nallathaakunnu / kartthaave! Prabhaatha samayatthu ente shabdam nee kellkkename.

/tprabhaatha samayatthu nyaan orukkatthode ninakku kaana ppedumaaraakaname / kartthaave! Ninte janangallodu karuna cheyyaname / kartthaave! Nyangallellaavarudeyum paapangall pariharichu kshamikkename / parishuddhanaayullllaave! / Ninte valathukai nyangalludemel aashvasippichu / thirunaamam nimittham nyangallude paaparogatthil ninnu / nyangalle sukhappedutthaname.
